values.value: THIS CHARGE IS DENIED BASED ON THE PROCEDURE CODE YOUR PROVIDER USED. THIS PROVIDER IS NOT ELIGIBLE TO BILL THE PROCEDURE CODE FOR THIS SERVICE BASED ON OUR REIMBURSEMENT POLICIES. FOR THE CLAIM TO BE RECONSIDERED, THE PROVIDER MUST SUBMIT A CORRECTED CLAIM USING AN APPROPRIATE PROCEDURE OR HCPCS CODE. THE PROVIDER MUST ALSO INDICATE IT IS A REPLACEMENT CLAIM OR CLEARLY MARK IT WITH THE WORD "CORRECTED."
